title: Almost got 1 Shot by Illaoi as Riv.
body:
Almost died instantly in 1 second, dropped to 100hp down from 1200.

Test of Spirit and ulted me, 1 tentacle is now 3, Harsh Lessoned and Tentacle Smashed and all 3 Tentacles smashed me and my Soul.

Literally all she had was black cleaver, Tentacles doing like 150 Damage each and like 40% of that to my spirit which goes to me, coupled with like 270 to me from her ulti and like 40% of that to my soul and Harsh Lesson as an auto attack reset for like 150 Damage and all in all took like 450 from the tentacles directly, like 200 to my soul, 250 from the ult, 110 to my soul and like 120 then 150 from Harsh Lesson straight after that and that's like 450+200+250+110+120+15 which is like 1K damage instantly.

Almost got instagibbed. (Think she had a pickaxe too coz she got titanic later so the numbers are slightly lower).

replies.body: Lesson learned: Don't stand next to your soul.

> [{quoted}](name=Section 9,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WLAItAnU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-25T16:35:06.071+0000)
>
> Lesson learned: Don't stand next to your soul.

I went up agaisnt here as Irelia last night and god, I feel your pain she was quite intense to go up agaisnt.
As sup she can pretty much bully the 2 bots while her adc free farms...  Bit too tanky with too much damage,  one or the other could do with lowering.
They need to add diminishing returns for each additional tentacle that hits an enemy.
so you don't like that there is another champ that can 1 shot kk
So tru lel riv still 1840x more annoying
then dont let her hit you with 10 tentacles.
Yeah he is Op af, tankier than the tanks, deals as much dmg as the AP or AD carries T.T
